string.min: {{field}} must be at least {{limit}} characters long
string.max: {{field}} must be at most {{limit}} characters long
string.email: {{field}} must be a valid email address

number.min: {{field}} must be greater than or equal to {{limit}}
number.max: {{field}} must be less than or equal to {{limit}}

date.min: The date of {{field}} must be after {{limit}}
date.max: The date of {{field}} must be before {{limit}}

NewEventApplyBeforeStart: The application date must be before the start date
NewEventEndBeforeStart: The start date must be before the end date
